about_me: Hello! My name is Socrates and I am 30 years old. Although I am an engineer, teaching is my passion, and I have been working as a Greek teacher for the last 5 years. In my free time, I enjoy learning foreign languages, reading books, and playing chess. Furthermore, I am interested in a large variety of topics such as music (i play the piano), history, science and I love traveling as well.
teaching_style: I provide classes to all levels of learners. Therefore, I can teach absolute beginners from scratch as well as advanced learners that already have a high level of Greek. In both cases, my goal is to make you speak as much as you can in Greek through various activities in a friendly and non-judgemental environment. Please, feel free to make a lot of mistakes, since I believe that only through our mistakes do we get better.

about_me: Hi, I'm Lina! I'm from Indonesia. I've got a bachelor's degree in Indonesian Language and Literature and a master's degree in Indonesian Linguistics. Love, Lina. :)
